content.rendered:
MSA Innovation is the central hub of the firm’s innovation efforts, accelerating digital development and helping our clients to excel. In particular, we work with generative AI and with identifying and investing in new technology, improving workflows, and promoting innovative solutions. To enable our digital ecosystem to grow, we collaborate with clients, technology providers, entrepreneurs and academia.

As a legal adviser and long-term strategic partner, our commitment is to provide the highest quality legal advice. This requires continual evaluation and enhancement of our working methods through innovative solutions and creative approaches. We see digital transformation as an enabler for both our firm and our clients.
